traffic cones.description: A series of orange traffic cones are arranged in a line on the right side of the road, occupying part of the lane and indicating a work zone or an area to avoid
traffic cones.explanation: The cones suggest that there might be road work ahead or a requirement to merge into the adjacent lane to continue safely.

other objects.description: There is a stationary tent-like structure on the right side, close to the building which seems unrelated to traffic but is near the roadside
other objects.explanation: While the structure itself does not directly impact driving behaviors, its proximity to the road requires that the driver remains cautious in case of any unexpected movements around that area.

general_perception.description and explanation: In the traffic image, there are no vehicles, vulnerable road users, traffic signs, traffic lights, or barriers present. However, there is a series of orange traffic cones arranged in a line on the right side of the road, occupying part of the lane. These cones indicate a work zone or an area to avoid and suggest that there might be road work ahead or a requirement to merge into the adjacent lane to continue safely. Additionally, there is a stationary tent-like structure on the right side, close to a building. Although it seems unrelated to traffic and is near the roadside, it does not directly impact driving behaviors. Nevertheless, its proximity to the road requires that the driver remains cautious in case of any unexpected movements around that area.

1.description and explanation: This object appears to be a traffic cone, typically made from a flexible plastic material with a bright, reflective orange color. Traffic cones are used to signal areas to be cautious around or to demarcate specific areas off-limits to vehicles temporarily. In this case, the cone may be indicating an area of road work or a particular hazard on the road which the ego car should avoid by steering clear, thus affecting how the ego car navigates through this area.

2.description and explanation: The object is a traffic cone typically used in road settings to guide or redirect traffic in a safe manner. It serves as a warning or safety signal for drivers indicating potential hazards on the road or areas where driving is restricted, such as construction zones or lanes that are closed. For the ego car, this cone signifies that it should proceed with caution and possibly avoid certain areas of the road to maintain safety.

driving_suggestion: The ego vehicle should reduce speed and be prepared to merge left if necessary, while remaining vigilant for any road workers or additional instructions that may be present as it passes the work zone indicated by the traffic cones. Maintaining a safe distance from the cones and the structure on the side will ensure safety for all road users.
